Fun game. Addicting once you get the hang of it. It does need some music or something in the background. Also, there arent enough seconds to earn extra points. I'm on level 65 and have only been able to do it a few times. Other than that it's great.
Totally worth checking out- I'm a fan!

Update: beginner level 90 got fixed, but now beginner level 96 is impossible. I've now completed all the levels of intermediate and difficult, so it seems that maybe this one just needs rebalancing. ove this game, but level 90 is impossible. I've completed harder games in random play with no problem. There is no way 90 can be done with the allotted moves.
This game is so awesome .I love this game so much. My whole family plays this game.
Fun game that makes me actually have to think! Exercising the brain a little is a plus! Not quite as addictive as a few others, so I mean that in a good way. Wish there were more options though..
Thanks, I like it a lot. Simple to learn, but it's a challenge to see how quickly I can solve the puzzles.
I enjoy this game, it's hard enough to be a challenge, but simple enough to keep me interested.

review.review_title: Is there any solutions for beginner stage 46?
review.review_text: Please let me know if you find one. I tried with many different ways to solve it but I failed.
Overall I like it a lot. The only real issue is that when you're playing random games you have more tries than when you're playing levels. Might be nice to have a hint option.
Addictive
Loved game until dark theme update. Please let us undo update.
I love this game but recently I have had problems with ads popping up constantly. I will not waste my time with the game any more and have deleted it.
This game is not only fun and addictive, you progress level by level so it gradually gets harder but is not impossible to beat so it's not too frustrating.
Never gets boring.

I've played it for a long time and love it. I've finished all levels several times. BUT, just recently it's been acting up. The same ad keeps popping up every 5 seconds. I click the X on it to get rid of it, then go back to the game screen. Before I can click on a color tile, the ad comes up again. Every other time it will go to the ad or to itunes to download the app. I've turned off my phone. I've deleted the app and re-installed it multiple times, but it still happens. I don't mind ads, but this is ridiculous. I hope this can be fixed. It's a 5-star game, but right now it's behaving as a 0-star.
Challenging Fun!Always the same, but always different. The rules aren't well explained but it's fun to learn by doing. I don't understand how the games are scored; just know it's fun to play.
Love this game, but level 90 is impossible. I've completed harder games in random play with no problem. There is no way 90 can be done with the allotted moves.
If you want to keep your brain sharp, this is the best game for it. It works for me!
This WAS a fun game, now it is garish, boring, annoying, and I need to figure out how to delete it. Wish I could give it zero stars.

If it ain't broke don't fix it!Worked perfectly in all the time I've had this app. Now there's a new user interface (why?) but pretty much all it does now is crash. I get in a random game occasionally but can't choose the other three levels.
Nice challenges!
Good fun that is not cluttered up with any silly plot. Mindless, as most games are, but as easy or as challenging as you want it to be.
This is a great game to pass the time.
This simple game works as a stress reliever for me. It's just difficult enough to keep my attention, simple enough to sooth me and compelling to the point of losing an hour or more.
A lot of fun. Very challenging. Simple to learn. Very addicting.
I have been playing this app fir a long time and still is one of my favorites! I do like the older version a bit better because the colors are brighter. Yet this particular version is loads of fun!
Fun game; however, in-app purchases are obnoxious at the beginning. One wrong swipe or tap and you have ad tracking.

review.review_title: Great game, small bug, major bummer
review.review_text: If you change skins, you're unable to revert back to the original. Sounds petty, but not having the shading on the tiles and the same line weight in the borders really impacts playability. Had to delete and reload app, and lost my progress. Otherwise, it's a blast!
Great game..fun addictin challenging but not impossible. Overall five out of five! Amazing

The only reason why I am not giving this app 5 stars is for one simple reason. Before the last update I had accomplished the majority of the puzzles. After said update I had to start all over. Not cool
Can't believe this isn't top rated yet. Love the game. Addicting. Great time passer and puzzle. One of my faves so far.
can't think of anything I don't like about it! addicting puzzle game
Once you get started it's hard to stop. Just sit back and relax. Don't let it stress you out. Make it fun.

Nice relaxing game, easy to play.
Great fun, relaxing too!!!
easy to play, mind numbing game that doesn't seem overwhelmed with ads within. Love playing this game.

This game does not crash, is very addictive and fun. Easy to learn and many difficulty levels and game modes. A must have for quick breaks. But beware.... So easy to slip into just one more round. Lol
Great game... Definitely download it!

This is a fun puzzle game that isn't mindless.
I really enjoy this game. I would love more frequent updates, though!

I got so addicted to it is so much fun and u will never get old of it and if u retry the level they give u a new puzzle but it is better. The only thing is in always get done to the last turn and I have one more color left😡
Very addicting! Thoroughly enjoy playing.
What more can I say! Simply addictive and NEVER crashes!

This latest release said there were new level added. I got excited, I updated and opened it. New face, so I knew it had really updated, yet when I clicked on play, there were no new levels to the non social media sections (I don't know about them, because I don't connect to those to play). What gives?

This is a fun game that keeps you coming back for more. The premiss is simple - turn all the squares one color in a limited amount of moves. But as the challenges increase you will want to keep at it until you succeed.

I simply dont pay attention to the time. I just play it having fun.

Two point: Point #1) I really like playing this App! I like problem solving, and I don't feel the need to race against the timer (important to me). I'm both challenged and relaxed by this game and a couple of others. Point #2) This is one of a few Apps that I can both really enjoy and will not keep me from falling asleep. The App can simply allow me to fall asleep while playing it. It is perfect for me.
Addicting. Love it.
Love this game!

Although this game is fun. And I love the concept. Whoever set the time limit for these levels, is delirious. I'm really good at these kind of games. Even the easier levels, that actually have more of the same color linked together, are impossible to meet the set time. 71 seconds! To make 51 moves! Ridiculous. I've made it to the higher levels, after replaying the same ones over and over. Make the higher levels of this game a little more possible, and you'll get my 5 stars.

Most of the screenshots above show the old version of the game--easy to view and play (for hours!). However, they revised the graphics, and now the tiles have a white outline that creates glare. The "Level 1" screenshot above shows the new tiles. They cause my vision to swim & my eyes to hurt after only a few games. So I have stopped playing this wonderful game. Please, Please, Please put the old version of tiles back in the next revision. This new one creates eye strain & migraines. :( And after only a couple of games, the colors start swimming together.
Like any good game is.
I like it. It makes you stop and consider the whole board as the "obvious" move isn't always the best one. It's not chess, but it does require stategy to beat the higher levels.

review.review_title: Ruined the game with the update!
review.review_text: I LOVED the first version but the current update is awful...loses its graphic impact by making tiny squares with lots of background behind them. RUINED it. Bring back the original version, please!

review.review_title: Too much black space between the blocks
review.review_text: There's too much space between the blocks on the playing board, and it makes it really hard to play especially on my iPad. There is nothing wrong with the way the board looked before.I play this game nightly but now I'm not sure I'll be in the play until there is some type of adjustment made.
Really fun game. The levels are challenging. I try to beat the turns in each level, but it's really hard to do that and also beat the time!

review.review_title: If you could just change 1 thing...

review.review_title: Why change a five star game to a two star one
review.review_text: This was my favorite game. Now it's just ok. Why did you change it. How can I downgrade back to the original
The new colors in the game are atrocious. If these were the original colors when I first saw the game, i would have never dowloaded it. Plese bring back the bright colors.

Since the major update the game is almost in playable now. The colors are awful I'm having a hard time seeing then and telling the difference between them. Make the colors less cartoonie and more vibrant again. Change isn't always better.
Way to fill time

If it isn't broken, dont fix it!!"New and improved" often isn't. You had a five star game and now it is difficult to see and less enjoyable to play. I liked the way it was. Return the old skin. Remember, it is really our game not your game. I will buy the ad free ver and rate 5 stars when you restore the original look and feel. Thank you.

I just downloaded the new update. I don't like it at all. I'm so sorry I updated. It was great the way it was the colors were bright and easy to see these new colors are flat and impossible to see. Is there any way to get back the old version with the bright colors??

I haven't got there, but on the iPhone I imagine the higher levels will show veeeeery tiny blocks on the screen, making it impossible to play.
Just like flood it 2 but for the iPad. Works great. :)
this game is really addicting and always fun, get it, lucky that its free

This app was great before the upgrade which introduced aaas bar across the top of the screen which doesn't go away and changes during game play. I will be telling everyone I know not to get this app while the obtrusive ad bar is still there.

This is an easy to use, fun app. Addictive. Directions could have been a little clearer. You must get all the tiles to change color in the number of moves allowed up at the top left. It shows how many moves you've made as you go along. Overall, very pleased.

Andreas Katzian has produced a nice, fun series of puzzles. 54 levels. The object is to make all the stones 1 color. The bottom left corner stone represents the starting stone. If the adjacent stone is blue, tap blue and your the stone becomes blue and it absorbs the neighboring stone. Like the Borg of Star Trek. 10 seconds to learn. Stone Flood is almost identical to Flood It - another iphone app.Great puzzle apps: Lab Mice, Subway Shuffle, Numeric Paranoia, Blockhouse
Fun and relaxing
The only issue I have is that all of the labels for buttons are incorrect. They appear to be showing the names of the variables "main.play" "main.option" instead of the contents of the variables.
Terrible colours, so insipid! Bring back the old version!
Great game!!

Just the best game ever, seriously. Took me about 1 minute literally to pick up the game and now I'm just totally addicted. It's always one more game, one more game. It does however lack iPhone 5 optimisation which is disappointing. Hopefully there will be an update with iPhone 5 optimisation.

love it. just wish we could see the puzzle when all the pieces are one color, but when you click on the last (winning) colour change instead of showing us that triumphal moment when all the pieces are one colour, the game is over. there is no closure.
